report.title: Osiris tabular SATs
report.description: Tabular output for Osiris showing specific assemblages.
report.query:
select #columns# from ( -- Query to load the SAT output for scratchpad 259/F002 select t_sat.id, t_sat.id as term_id, t_bb.term as bb_term, t_sb.term as sb_term, t_sat.term as term, count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) as speciescount, count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::float * 100 / ( select count(distinct ttlsub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlsub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub on avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlsub.id and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sat_attr_id# and avsub.int_value=t_sat.id ) as "rep", sqi.sqi, nullif(count(distinct case when ttd.taxon_id is null then null else ttl.taxon_meaning_id end), 0) as "cons_count", string_agg(coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation), '|' order by td.code) as "cons", it.threshold as "threshold", tcode.term as "code", case when count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)>=it.threshold then 'Favourable' else 'Unfavourable' end as "condition" -- Start by pulling in the list of SAT terms from taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sat join cache_termlists_terms t_sat on t_sat.id=av_sat.int_value join cache_termlists_terms tcode on tcode.meaning_id=t_sat.meaning_id and tcode.preferred=false
-- Join via the species data linked to the SAT term to the appropriate scratchpad list join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=av_sat.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id
-- Include the specific biotopes left join (taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sb join cache_termlists_terms t_sb on t_sb.id=av_sb.int_value ) on av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sb.deleted=false and av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sb_attr_id# and (t_sb.id in (t_sat.parent_id) or t_sb.id is null)
-- include the broad biotopes left join (taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_bb join cache_termlists_terms t_bb on t_bb.id=av_bb.int_value ) on av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_bb.deleted=false and av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#bb_attr_id# and (t_bb.id in (t_sat.parent_id, t_sb.parent_id) or t_bb.id is null)
left join pantheon.isis_thresholds it on it.code=tcode.term left join ( select av_sat1.int_value as sat_id, round(avg(rscv.int_value)*100) as sqi from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sat1 on av_sat1.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sat1.deleted=false and av_sat1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sat_attr_id# join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#rarity_score_attr_id# -- #joins# group by av_sat1.int_value ) as sqi on sqi.sat_id=av_sat.int_value left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttd join taxon_designations td on td.id=ttd.taxon_designation_id and td.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms cat on cat.id=td.category_id and ( (cat.term='GB Red List' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('LC', 'NA', 'pLC', 'pNA', 'NE')) or (cat.term='GB Status' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('None', 'Not reviewed', 'Not native')) or (cat.term not in ('GB Red List', 'GB Status')) ) ) on ttd.taxon_id=ttl.taxon_id and ttd.deleted=false
where av_sat.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sat_attr_id# and av_sat.deleted=false group by tcode.term, t_bb.term, t_sb.term, t_sat.id, t_sat.term, it.threshold, sqi.sqi ) as sub where 1=1

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.website_id in (#website_ids#) and o.survey_id=(select survey_id from samples where id=#sample_id#) and o.sample_id=#sample_id# and o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.id
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id=#sample_id#

column.name: rep
column.sql: case when sub.rep<1 then '<1' else round(sub.rep)::varchar end
